const mockCocktails = [{
  id: 1,
  name: "Mojito",
  recipe: "In a glass, muddle mint leaves and sugar. Add lime juice, rum, and soda water. Stir and garnish with mint.",
  ingredients: ["mint", "sugar", "lime", "white rum", "soda water"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Easy",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 2,
  name: "Old Fashioned",
  recipe: "Muddle sugar and bitters with a splash of water. Add bourbon and ice. Stir gently and garnish with an orange peel.",
  ingredients: ["sugar", "bitters", "bourbon", "orange"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Medium",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 3,
  name: "Pina Colada",
  recipe: "Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice. Serve garnished with pineapple and cherry.",
  ingredients: ["white rum", "coconut cream", "pineapple juice"],
  style: "Tropical",
  complexityLevel: "Easy",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 4,
  name: "Martini",
  recipe: "Stir gin and vermouth with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with an olive or lemon twist.",
  ingredients: ["gin", "vermouth", "olive"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Medium",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 5,
  name: "Cosmopolitan",
  recipe: "Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with lime.",
  ingredients: ["vodka", "triple sec", "cranberry juice", "lime"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Medium",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 6,
  name: "Margarita",
  recipe: "Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice. Strain into a salted glass and garnish with a lime slice.",
  ingredients: ["tequila", "lime juice", "triple sec"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Easy",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 7,
  name: "Negroni",
  recipe: "Stir equal parts gin, Campari, and vermouth with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with an orange slice.",
  ingredients: ["gin", "Campari", "vermouth"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Medium",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 8,
  name: "Moscow Mule",
  recipe: "Mix vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice in a copper mug. Garnish with a lime wedge.",
  ingredients: ["vodka", "ginger beer", "lime"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Easy",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 9,
  name: "Whiskey Sour",
  recipe: "Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with a cherry.",
  ingredients: ["whiskey", "lemon juice", "sugar"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Easy",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 10,
  name: "French 75",
  recipe: "Shake gin, lemon juice, and sugar with ice. Strain into a glass and top with champagne.",
  ingredients: ["gin", "lemon juice", "sugar", "champagne"],
  style: "Classic",
  complexityLevel: "Medium",
  type: "Premium",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 11,
  name: "Espresso Martini",
  recipe: "Shake vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with coffee beans.",
  ingredients: ["vodka", "espresso", "coffee liqueur"],
  style: "Modern",
  complexityLevel: "Medium",
  type: "Premium",
  price: 8.0
}, {
  id: 12,
  name: "Aperol Spritz",
  recipe: "Mix Aperol, prosecco, and soda water over ice. Garnish with an orange slice.",
  ingredients: ["Aperol", "prosecco", "soda water"],
  style: "Modern",
  complexityLevel: "Easy",
  type: "Regular",
  price: 8.0
}];
export default mockCocktails;

sourcesContent:
const mockCocktails = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Mojito",
    recipe:
      "In a glass, muddle mint leaves and sugar. Add lime juice, rum, and soda water. Stir and garnish with mint.",
    ingredients: ["mint", "sugar", "lime", "white rum", "soda water"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Easy",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Old Fashioned",
    recipe:
      "Muddle sugar and bitters with a splash of water. Add bourbon and ice. Stir gently and garnish with an orange peel.",
    ingredients: ["sugar", "bitters", "bourbon", "orange"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Medium",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    name: "Pina Colada",
    recipe:
      "Blend rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice. Serve garnished with pineapple and cherry.",
    ingredients: ["white rum", "coconut cream", "pineapple juice"],
    style: "Tropical",
    complexityLevel: "Easy",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    name: "Martini",
    recipe:
      "Stir gin and vermouth with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with an olive or lemon twist.",
    ingredients: ["gin", "vermouth", "olive"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Medium",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    name: "Cosmopolitan",
    recipe:
      "Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with lime.",
    ingredients: ["vodka", "triple sec", "cranberry juice", "lime"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Medium",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Margarita",
    recipe:
      "Shake tequila, lime juice, and triple sec with ice. Strain into a salted glass and garnish with a lime slice.",
    ingredients: ["tequila", "lime juice", "triple sec"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Easy",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Negroni",
    recipe:
      "Stir equal parts gin, Campari, and vermouth with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with an orange slice.",
    ingredients: ["gin", "Campari", "vermouth"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Medium",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: "Moscow Mule",
    recipe:
      "Mix vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice in a copper mug. Garnish with a lime wedge.",
    ingredients: ["vodka", "ginger beer", "lime"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Easy",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    name: "Whiskey Sour",
    recipe:
      "Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with a cherry.",
    ingredients: ["whiskey", "lemon juice", "sugar"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Easy",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    name: "French 75",
    recipe:
      "Shake gin, lemon juice, and sugar with ice. Strain into a glass and top with champagne.",
    ingredients: ["gin", "lemon juice", "sugar", "champagne"],
    style: "Classic",
    complexityLevel: "Medium",
    type: "Premium",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Espresso Martini",
    recipe:
      "Shake vodka, espresso, and coffee liqueur with ice. Strain into a glass and garnish with coffee beans.",
    ingredients: ["vodka", "espresso", "coffee liqueur"],
    style: "Modern",
    complexityLevel: "Medium",
    type: "Premium",
    price: 8.0,
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    name: "Aperol Spritz",
    recipe:
      "Mix Aperol, prosecco, and soda water over ice. Garnish with an orange slice.",
    ingredients: ["Aperol", "prosecco", "soda water"],
    style: "Modern",
    complexityLevel: "Easy",
    type: "Regular",
    price: 8.0,
  },
];

export default mockCocktails;
